hillbillies.model.util

Class PathFinder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.util.PathFinder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type representing positions.

    public class PathFinder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple generic A* pathfinder.
    Invariant:
    The glue must be effective.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public java.util.Deque<T> getPath(T start,
                                  T target)
        Calculate a path from start to target.
        Parameters:
        start - The start position.
        target - The end position.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of position from start to target. The list is in reverse order, the first element will be target and the last will be start. If no path can be found getPath returns null.

      • isReachable

        public boolean isReachable(T start,
                           T target)
